explains: v. 彻底检修，全面改造；全面改革（制度或方法）；（尤指在体育竞赛中）赶上，超过
n. 大修，彻底检修；（制度或方法的）全面改革
wordGroup: major overhaul 大修；全面检修
complete overhaul 大修；全面检修

sentences.en: The average budget for a "major" kitchen overhaul in 2006, calculates Remodeling magazine, was a staggering $54,000; even a "minor" improvement cost on average $18,000.
sentences.cn: 根据《重塑》杂志的计算，2006年厨房“大修”的平均预算是54000美元；即使是“小”的改进，平均花费也要18000美元。

sentences.en: A radical overhaul of the tax system is necessary.
He managed to overhaul the leader on the final lap.
sentences.cn: 他在最后一圈努力超过了领先的人。
